text:
@realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr @marcorubio @SenatorCollins @SteveDaines @SenThomTillis @SenCoryGardner Trump supporters, this little charade was just for you, to pretend that things are back to normal, no social distancing, no masks.
Couldn’t be further from the truth. Educate yourselves. Look at the latest data. COVID-19 is spiking again all around the world. Do what’s right!!
